article_title: IRS Still Isn't Ready For Obamacare, Says Watchdog

article_metadata.description: The Affordable Care Act and the IRS are hardly a match made in heaven, says a new report. Currently, there is no way for the IRS and Exchanges to cross-check qualifications to ensure that tax credits are only being claimed by those who are entitled to them.
article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood
